name: World War II: TCG
storyline:
"World War II : TCG" is a free-to-play collectible card game based on the events of World War II. Create an Army Decks with ww2 cards - Tanks, Infantry, Aircrafts, Ships, Submarines, etc... and increase firepower with powerful weapons and strategic orders!

-= FEATURES =-
- The first World War 2 TCG game.
- Single player fictional campaign (more than 500 missions)
- Online / Offline PvP Mode
- Deck builder
- 5 Factions and over 1000 WWII cards
- Strategic and dynamic gameplay
- Become the ultimate General!
- A Strategic Card Wargame - TCG Games
- Join the Battlefield for hundreds of challenges.

World War II: TCG has a single player mode consists of 190 WW2 missions starting as a soldier and progressing through different battlefields and distributed in several campaigns based on historical military events from World War II.

There are three major types of ww2 cards in World War II TCG – Units, Items and Orders. Every card is based on historical World War 2 units and weapons (e.g.: Japanese A6M Zero plane, Fighting First Division, Tiger…). Units will be Tanks, Infantries, Planes, Ships and Submarines. Create an army and move the cards to the warzone, with multiple tactics to use, you can become the best player in the battlefield.

Our Resource System is different from other tcg games, and can be similar to a wargame, you have 3 action points that you can use to deploy cards. This mechanic gives a wargame atmosphere and creates different layers of strategy where you have plenty options from turn one.

A unique mechanic of WWII : TCG is promoting units. You can use resources to promote units to be more powerful, a card starts as a simple soldier and will gain more stats and abilities while promoting.

WWII : TCG has a cross-platform multiplayer online mode where you can fight against other players on a battlefield.
Download this free to play card wargame ( free ccg ) and enjoy playing against other generals!

Keys:

- Fight on Hundreds of Unique Missions!
- Exclusive battlefields through different campaigns!
- Craft real World War II Units
- Play co-operative raids with team mates
- Build an army decks from World War II
- As a soldier play online against other enemies or practice vs friends!
- Historical strategic card wargame!

World War II: TCG - WW2 Card Game brings the best of strategy games and card games, experience multiple battles against opponent generals, battle front is awaiting for skilled players. Prepare tactics in advance, tanks, planes & ships will be ready for battle!

As fan of ww2 games, you will be able to collect historical wwii cards to battle in strategy matches through multiple battlefields and it's a completely free to obtain all powerful ww2 cards!
summary: World War II: TCG is a free-to-play collectible card game. Create your own Army Deck with Tanks, Infantry, Aircrafts, Ships, Submarines and Structures!
